Name: fishy
About the game: Fishy is a short, heartfelt visual novel about friends, enemies, acceptance, and monsters. Play as a middle schooler with a prosthetic arm, navigating fear and friendship. Explore the aquarium, face your fears, and maybe even make a friend. Fishy features 583 individual hand-drawn sea creatures and an atmospheric original score. A lovingly crafted bite-sized journey, Fishy is best experienced when played in one sitting (roughly 30 minutes).
